Hotel Transylvania is a five star resort that serves as a haven for the monsters can rest from the hard work of chasing and scaring humans. The site is run by Count Dracula (Adam Sandler), who decides to invite friends to celebrate over the weekend, the 118th anniversary of his daughter Mavis (Selena Gomez). What he did not expect was that Jonathan (Adam Samberg), a human clueless, would appear in the local fair when the hotel is full of guests and, moreover, fall in love with Mavis.
